attributes.action: Intorduce the Ten Commandments of living in England
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
1) Wash your net curtains
2) Do not use newspaper/any other rubbish you can lay your hands on as net curtains
3) Keep your gardens tidy and neat
4) Converse with your neighbours, do not shunn them 
5) Realise you need to get a job and work, not expect me to pay your benefits through my tax contributions
6) Only pay Child Benefit for the first two children, any more than two then pay for them yourself, get a job.
7) Driveways are for parking your cars on, not the grass verges.
8) Manners, manners, manners.
9) Respect 
10) Get a job and work
10a) Don't spit
10b) Keep your feet off the chairs

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
